Documentation.TagDescription:
**Masterdata**

Access all relevent masterdata, which may be used throughout the system.

MethodDocumentation.GET:
Returns static cost center information for testing and development purposes. Supports OData filtering for flexible data retrieval.

> [!TIP]
> Supports OData filtering: Use `$filter`, `$select`, `$orderby`, `$top`, and `$skip` parameters for flexible data retrieval.
